resources.string: API key from your Dark Sky developer account

After the free weather APIs I used hit their limit, I spent several months writing my own weather service so that I could keep this app subscription free. Weather can now be activated with a small one-time purchase below. This money will support current and future development of the app, with many exciting updates planned. If you cannot afford to support me, you can request an unlock code. If you are unsatisfied with your purchase, contact me for a full refund. Thanks for using my app :)
Thanks for making further development of this watch face possible!
Use thin text for clock in ambient mode
Use gray info text in ambient mode
Show the current weather as an icon
Dark Sky support has been discontinued. These options are only present if you have previously entered a Dark Sky key.
Use Dark Sky as a weather provider. The default providers will still be used as fallbacks
